bib.title: How can landscape ecology contribute to sustainability science?
bib.author: Paul Opdam and Sandra Luque and Joan Nassauer and Peter H. Verburg and Jianguo Wu
bib.abstract: While landscape ecology is distinct from sustainability science, landscape ecologists have expressed their ambitions to help society advance sustainability of landscapes. In this context Wu (2013) coined the concept of landscape sustainability science. In August of 2017 we joined the 5th forum of landscape sustainability science in
